metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24822 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability in the dwarf::cursor::uleb function of Libelfin v0.3 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) through a segmentation fault via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: libelfin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
